import './intro.scss' import KeyboardArrowDownIcon from '@mui/icons-material/KeyboardArrowDown'; import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import { init } from 'ityped' export default function Intro() { const textRef = useRef(); useEffect(()=>{ console.log(textRef) },[]) return (
